issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

components.name: TiAPI
components.description: This component is used for cross-platform API work. Specifications are most likely to use this component.

fields.description:
In order to follow convention, move the following Ti.UI.EmailDialog constants to [Titanium.UI|http://developer.appcelerator.com/apidoc/mobile/latest/Titanium.UI-module]:

* [CANCELLED|http://developer.appcelerator.com/apidoc/mobile/latest/Titanium.UI.EmailDialog.CANCELLED-property.html]
* [FAILED|http://developer.appcelerator.com/apidoc/mobile/latest/Titanium.UI.EmailDialog.FAILED-property.html]
* [SAVED|http://developer.appcelerator.com/apidoc/mobile/latest/Titanium.UI.EmailDialog.SAVED-property.html]
* [SENT|http://developer.appcelerator.com/apidoc/mobile/latest/Titanium.UI.EmailDialog.SENT-property.html]

This was at stramer's request, [here|https://github.com/appcelerator/titanium_mobile/pull/1470#r486739]
fields.summary: TiAPI: UI.EmailDialog.CONTANTS - move status constants to Ti.UI

comments.body: Closing ticket due to the time passed, lack of information and lack of progress. Any problems, please file a new ticket.
